ing: 1 (12 ounce) box BarillaÂ® Gluten Free Rotini
1 cup smoked salmon (lox), sliced in strips
n: BarillaÂ® Gluten Free Lox Pasta Salad
des: "This quick and easy pasta salad recipe combines gluten-free pasta with green olives, capers, salmon, and basil and is served with wedges of hard-boiled eggs."
ins:
Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package directions.
Drain pasta and toss with olive oil in a bowl. Let cool for 5 minutes.
Combine pasta with all remaining ingredients. Garnish with hard boiled eggs.
Serve immediately, do not chill.
